Question: Did the agent use the standard company greeting and introduce themselves?
Did the agent verify the customer’s identity according to security protocols?
Did the agent provide accurate and up-to-date information?
Did the agent use the customer's name at least once during the call?
Did the agent avoid interrupting the customer while they were speaking?
Did the agent maintain a professional and empathetic tone throughout?
Did the agent summarize the actions taken or the next steps?
Did the agent ask if there was anything else they could assist with?
Was the customer’s primary issue resolved or escalated correctly?
Did the agent follow proper "hold" procedures (asking permission and thanking them for waiting)?
